left join sys_dict d on d.value = a.type and d.label = 'car_type'
mapper.select:
select
from cost_car a
order by a.input_date desc

SELECT a.y, sum(case when a.type = '1' then a.money else 0 end) as 'a', sum(case when a.type = '2' then a.money else 0 end) as 'b', sum(case when a.type = '3' then a.money else 0 end) as 'c', sum(case when a.type = '4' then a.money else 0 end) as 'd', sum(case when a.type = '5' then a.money else 0 end) as 'e' FROM ( SELECT LEFT (input_date, 4) AS 'y', money, type FROM cost_car ) a GROUP BY a.y
